title: Roboter Rek'sai - 3D Modell von Reksai als Roboter

embed.title: Robot Rek'sai - League of Legends inspired Texture Study - Substance Painter, Luc As
embed.description: I really love the game so I made an League of Legends inspired re texture of Rek'sai as a Robot in Substance Painter. Spent a little more time than usual on this daily texture study, was mostly stuck upon the metallic/roughness values of the Claws in Proportion too the Metall Body.

body: Ich mach jeden Tag so daily Texture Studys in 3D, wollte mal was League bezogenes machen, hier ist Roboter Rek'sai, hoffe es gefällt der Community :)
